programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A demon brings villains out of horror movies and sends them to kill the witches.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Benny calls Dean for help after being brutally beaten by vampires. Meanwhile, Sam reflects on the life he left behind with Amelia.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a murder and find Garth is already on the case. Dean is not happy he has assumed Bobby's duties, but Garth points out someone needed to do it.Guests: D.J. Qualls..

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean are stunned when Castiel suddenly appears back on Earth with no memory of how he escaped from Purgatory. Meanwhile, Mrs. Tran enlists a witch to concoct a demon bomb, but the witch double crosses her.Guests: Cyrina Fiallo, Lauren Tom..

programme.title: Supernatural

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: A weekday NFL news and information show with Laura Rutledge joined by a rotating cast of NFL analysts, insiders and reporters.

programme.title: Open By Christmas
programme.desc: Nicky receives an unopened Christmas card from a secret admirer. She and Simone, her friend, attempt to track down the anonymous author.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: After taking a Family Tree DNA test, Vanessa learns of a family that she didn't even know existed, and decides to travel to their home for the holidays.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: Former classmates find themselves travelling home together for the holidays. When a storm hits, they must work together to each get to their destination.

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A single mother who's lost all interest in Christmas finds just what she needs when her uncle comes to visit.

programme.title: A Cheerful Christmas
programme.desc: As a 'Christmas Coach' a woman provides her clients with all the magic of the holidays. In order to make her new clients vision a success, she is tasked with working with their son, to find out all of their holiday traditions.

programme.title: Christmas at Graceland: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: A free-spirited former Graceland tour guide, awaiting news of her dream museum job, meets a busy single father on a Graceland tour and agrees to be his temporary nanny for the holidays.

programme.title: With Love, Christmas
programme.desc: An ad executive and her uptight co-worker must create the ultimate Christmas commercial. To complicate things, they are also each-others Secret Santa.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: A self-professed 'Christmas hater' is locked in a department store on Christmas Eve. There, she meets a woman who claims to be her 'guardian angel' and shares with her three Christmas ghosts.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two co-workers vying for the same promotion are tasked with creating a 12 Days of Christmas scavenger hunt to promote the premiere of a new hotel.

programme.title: Christmas in Harmony
programme.desc: A music executive expects a holiday promotion, but instead goes home to North Carolina in order to win her job back. Meanwhile, she is also co-directing the church choir with her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts are sent to a festive small town over Christmas. While pretending to get along for the sake of appearance, they discover that there's more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: My Christmas Family Tree
programme.desc: After taking a Family Tree DNA test, Vanessa learns of a family that she didn't even know existed, and decides to travel to their home for the holidays.

programme.title: A Holiday in Harlem
programme.desc: A business executive is known for transforming fledgling business into profit producers, and for avoiding Christmas in the neighbourhood where she grew up.

programme.title: A Christmas Treasure
programme.desc: Lou wonders if she should move to New York and continue working on her writing career after opening a 100-year-old time capsule and meeting a charming chef.

programme.title: A Christmas Treasure
programme.desc: Lou wonders if she should move to New York and continue working on her writing career after opening a 100-year-old time capsule and meeting a charming chef.

programme.title: Christmas Town
programme.desc: A woman leaves behind a life in Boston to embark on a new adventure. Unbeknownst to her, she ends up on an unexpected detour that changes both her life, and her romantic future.

programme.title: A December Bride
programme.desc: An aspiring interior designer is dreading the wedding of her cousin, who is marrying her ex-fiancé. She accepts an offer to go with a friend, the one responsible for introducing the soon-to-be bride and groom.

programme.title: Enchanted Christmas
programme.desc: An interior designer returns to Utah to spearhead a hotel renovation for the annual Christmas Eve show run by her former boyfriend. When she steps in to dance in the show's finale with him, she is torn between her job, family and feelings.

programme.title: Merry and Bright
programme.desc: Two people work together to make their candy-cane factory profitable, but in the end, it's their love that turns a profit.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town for Christmas and discovers that the town's historic general store has shut down. Using the skills she has as a retail designer, she is determined to bring the store back to life in time for the holidays.

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when her long time crush, Mitch, moves to her little town. Once she discovers his love for Christmas has changed she vows to bring his holiday spirit back.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes and Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: A woman is hired to decorate an estate building a few weeks before Christmas. While there, she works to break down the wall between her and the business owner, all while keeping the holiday spirit alive.

programme.title: Christmas Cookies
programme.desc: A small-town factory, Aunt Sally's Christmas Cookie Company, is sold to large conglomerate. Their executive must seal the deal and shut down the factory, the town's lifeblood, but things become complicated when she meets the new owner.

programme.title: Love, Lights, Hanukkah!
programme.desc: A woman prepares her restaurant for the busiest time of the year when she receives the results of her DNA test indicating that she is Jewish. The discovery leads her to a new family, and an unlikely romance over eight nights.
